name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

links.description: LynnFox’s video work spans music videos and commercial outputs. In 2003 they created a music video for Warp Records signed artist Chris Clark (now performing under the name Clark).

start.title: Chappie
start.creator_credit: Neill Blomkamp, Diana Cilliers, Julian Clarke, Mark Goldblatt, Simon Kinberg, Columbia Pictures, Genre Films, LStar Capital, MRC, Jules Cook and Terri Tatchell
start.brief_description: Every child comes into the world full of promise, and none more so than Chappie: he is gifted, special, a prodigy. Like any child, Chappie will come under the influence of his surroundings—some good, some bad—and he will rely on his heart and soul to find his way in the world and become his own man. But there’s one thing that makes Chappie different from any one else: he is a robot.

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

end.title: Prisoners
end.creator_credit: Denis Villeneuve, Renée April, Gary D. Roach, Joel Cox, Adam Kolbrenner, Andrew A. Kosove, Broderick Johnson, Kira Davis, 8:38 Productions, Alcon Entertainment, Madhouse Entertainment, Summit Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Patrice Vermette and Aaron Guzikowski
end.brief_description: Keller Dover is facing every parent’s worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her young friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is a dilapidated RV that had earlier been parked on their street.

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

links.description: Hugh Jackman’s work as a lead actor has placed him in the position to collaborate with a huge amount of filmmaking talent. In 2013 he worked with director Denis Villeneuve.

start.title: Prisoners
start.creator_credit: Denis Villeneuve, Renée April, Gary D. Roach, Joel Cox, Adam Kolbrenner, Andrew A. Kosove, Broderick Johnson, Kira Davis, 8:38 Productions, Alcon Entertainment, Madhouse Entertainment, Summit Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Patrice Vermette and Aaron Guzikowski

end.title: Empirical Study on the Influence of Sound on Retinal Persistence
end.title_annotation: Empirical Study on the Influence of Sound on Retinal Persistence

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

links.description: Denis Villeneuve is responsible for creating some spectacular visions of future worlds (Blade Runner 2046, Dune) however he also creates short experimental works including Empirical Study on the Influence of Sound on Retinal Persistence.

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

end.title: Elysium
end.creator_credit: Neill Blomkamp, April Ferry, Giorgio Armani, Julian Clarke, Lee Smith, Bill Block, Simon Kinberg, Alphacore, Genre Films, MRC, QED International, TriStar Pictures and Philip Ivey
end.brief_description: In the year 2159, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth. Secretary Rhodes, a hard line government ofﬁcial, will stop at nothing to enforce anti-immigration laws and preserve the luxurious lifestyle of the citizens of Elysium. That doesn’t stop the people of Earth from trying to get in, by any means they can. When unlucky Max is backed into a corner, he agrees to take on a daunting mission that, if successful, will not only save his life, but could bring equality to these polarized worlds.

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

links.description: Outside of music videos, Chris Clark’s music has been connected with moving image works through film soundtracks, film scores, and contributions to advertising campaigns. In 2013, his track “The Pining Pt.2” was featured in the foture-focused film Elysium.

start.title: Elysium
start.creator_credit: Neill Blomkamp, April Ferry, Giorgio Armani, Julian Clarke, Lee Smith, Bill Block, Simon Kinberg, Alphacore, Genre Films, MRC, QED International, TriStar Pictures and Philip Ivey
start.brief_description: In the year 2159, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth. Secretary Rhodes, a hard line government ofﬁcial, will stop at nothing to enforce anti-immigration laws and preserve the luxurious lifestyle of the citizens of Elysium. That doesn’t stop the people of Earth from trying to get in, by any means they can. When unlucky Max is backed into a corner, he agrees to take on a daunting mission that, if successful, will not only save his life, but could bring equality to these polarized worlds.

end.title: Chappie
end.creator_credit: Neill Blomkamp, Diana Cilliers, Julian Clarke, Mark Goldblatt, Simon Kinberg, Columbia Pictures, Genre Films, LStar Capital, MRC, Jules Cook and Terri Tatchell
end.brief_description: Every child comes into the world full of promise, and none more so than Chappie: he is gifted, special, a prodigy. Like any child, Chappie will come under the influence of his surroundings—some good, some bad—and he will rely on his heart and soul to find his way in the world and become his own man. But there’s one thing that makes Chappie different from any one else: he is a robot.

constellations_other.name: From LynnFox to experimental metal
constellations_other.description: Björk's many collaborations with animation and directing trio LynnFox are one part of an elaborate web of artistic cross-pollination that spans genre and form.

links.description: A hallmark of director Neill Blomkamp’s films is his focus on the heart beating in dystopias and the moral bankruptcy of so-called utopian visions. In Chappie, Hugh Jackman appears alongside a droid programmed with feelings.
